mapper.update: update others_annualReviewStatus set assessmentStatus = #{assessmentStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, classTeacher = #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, assessmentStatus, note, year, status, classTeacher from others_annualReviewStatus
